page.title: 11Stanhope Police Station
page.content: The Police Station is to be found on the Front Street in Stanhope.It is an old building,being built in 1841. Nowadays the Police Station is an unmanned station. However,someone can usually be found between 9 o'clock and 10 o'clock in the morning, and at lunch-times. Criminals are only locked in the cells in an emergency.The Police Station does not have a computer,but the policemen can radio in to the one at Crook. There are eight policemen and one police sergeant based at Stanhope.They work entirely in Weardale unless they are needed elsewhere in an emergency. To help them they have three panda cars and a Land Rover which is kept at Crook.The police's job at Stanhope is similiar to elsewhere, but in summer they spend quite a lot of time helping tourists to the area.
